```{r}
aoi_get(country = c("MX", "CA", "USA"))

eqdc <- st_crs (5070)

countries <- rnaturalearth::countries110 |>
  st_transform(eqdc)

states <- USAboundaries::us_states(resolution = "low") |>
  filter(!state_abbr %in% c("HI", "AK", "PR")) |>
  st_transform(eqdc)
```
